title.text: Global smartphone shipments market share, Q1 2022

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a 3D pie chart that visualizes the global smartphone shipments market share for Q1 2022. The pie chart is rendered in 3D with an alpha angle of 45 degrees and a beta angle of 0 degrees, giving it a three-dimensional appearance. Data labels are enabled, showing the name of each slice. The data series is named 'Share' and includes slices for Samsung, Apple, Xiaomi (with a selected and sliced appearance), Oppo*, Vivo, and Others, each representing their respective market share percentages.
